4×4 Magazine was founded in 2013 with the mission of publishing the best creative writing of the Columbia Undergraduate community.

About

4×4 is a student-run literary collective, fundraising and operating independently from the university. We publish a print magazine each spring, and hold events and open mics throughout the year.

We accept submissions of any genre from all Columbia undergraduate students. Submissions are read anonymously and must pass a 2/3 majority in order to be published. 4×4 also hosts an annual competition judged by an accomplished author.

But we aren’t just a print magazine: we’ve also established a thriving writing community. Our events are often co-hosted with other groups in Morningside, like WBAR, Sig Ep, ADP and BookCulture.

Apply

The board of 4×4 consists exclusively of Columbia undergraduate students. We accept a group of new staff editors each fall, and editors remain on the board until they graduate. We welcome applicants of any class standing from all of Columbia’s undergraduate schools (CC, BC, GS, SEAS). Please note that editors cannot submit their work for awards or publication in the magazine. To download an application, click below. We look forward to meeting you!
